scripts.start: npm run docker:rskj:start && cd server && sleep 30 && go build -o ./server && ./server
scripts.docker:start: npm run docker:compose:start && npm run docker:connect
scripts.docker:compose:start: docker compose -f docker/polar/docker-compose-server.yml -f docker/polar/docker-compose-polar.yml -f docker/polar/docker-compose-rsk.yml -f docker/polar/docker-compose-boltz.yml up -d
scripts.docker:compose:stop: docker compose -f docker/polar/docker-compose-server.yml -f docker/polar/docker-compose-polar.yml -f docker/polar/docker-compose-rsk.yml -f docker/polar/docker-compose-boltz.yml down
